comments.text:
paper cuts that hurt me many times daily:

1. page focuses a search box on load. i try to scroll the page down with arrow keys. can't. have to click outside the box, or tab, and then scroll down.

2. page focuses a search box on load. try to go back with cmd+leftarrow. can't. have to unfocus the input box first.
